change: Hardened the deserialization call by introducing a filter that prevents known malicious gadgets from executing arbitrary code

faqs.question: Why does this codemod require a Pixee dependency?
faqs.answer: We always prefer to use existing controls built into Java, or a control from a well-known and trusted community dependency. However, older versions of Java don't support fine-grained deserialization filter controls, and there are no community-trusted controls.
